revised_title: High-Frequency Radiation of Water Waves by Oscillating Bodies
tldr: The article investigates the high-frequency radiation of water waves by oscillating bodies, focusing on the heave and sway radiation problems. The authors derive three-term asymptotic expansions for the radiated wave amplitude using matched asymptotic expansions and reciprocity principles. The results are applied to a circular cylinder and a hemisphere, providing insights into the behavior of water waves in the presence of oscillating bodies.
